pageContent: Purpose of review: Although no standard management of erectile dysfunction in prostate cancer (CaP) survivors exists, many treatment options are available. This review summarizes the current understanding of the cause and management of erectile dysfunction in CaP survivors.

metaData.source:
Evolving imaging methods of prostate cancer and the emergence of magnetic resonance imaging guided ablation techniques
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36465377/
